entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. A few flurries beginning this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
